channel.title: [508] help [*Will REP++ & Give FREE RS ACC*]
channel.description:
OK OK! i have found so many ip ban codes any methods but they do not work properly!
im looking for ::ipban commands that will ban the "ip" as well as there "host" so if they were to change there ip there host will still be banned.
also im looking for a code that will automatically ip ban players who spam.
and... :) i need something to make it so there can only be one connection per ip address!
also if your aware of a firewall that will automatically detect more than one connection from 1 ip connecting to server that will be awesome!
atm i have kaspersky but it will not disable ips connecting through a java server.
i also have zonealarm which can ip ban ips but not automatically detect a flood.
to whom i get this help from i will give a awesome 80 + rs account with ever skill at least 20. str att df is all around 80
